test.name: TCFO001_To verify that a User is able to open Budinet Page
TCFO002_To verify that user is able to Create Vehicle Order
TCFO003_To verify error message is displayed when No. of Vehicles Required is greater than 50
TCFO004_To verify error message is displayed when Lease Period is maximum of 24 months
TCFO005_To verify error message is displayed when Acquisition Type do not correspond to the Contract Type as loaded on the Finance scheme
TCFO006_To verify error message is displayed when future Order Date from Date Picker is selected
TCFO007_To verify that an error message is displayed when Re-Purchase price is greater than Purchase price
TCFO008_To verify that an error message is displayed when Retail Price can not be less or equal to the Purchase price
TCFO009_To verify error message is displayed when future Order Date from Date Picker is selected
TCFO010_To verify that Order Status is pending
TCFO013_To verify that Depreciation Rate is auto calculated after submitting the order
TCFO014_To verify that user is able to view Order History
TCFO015_To verify that User is able to Authorise Order
TCFO016_To verify that user is able to View Order
TCFO017_To verify that user is able to add Remarks
TCFO018_To verify that Order History is displayed
TCFO019_To verify that Override Order Details is displayed when user click on the Override button
TCFO020_To verify New Bidvest Fleet Vehicle Order Page is displayed when user click Reset button
TCFO021_To verify that a list of Vehicle list is displayed
TCFO034_To verify that user is able to Load Vehicle from the button
TCFO035_To verify error message is displayed when Identifier code format is not the last 6 chars of Vin No.
TCFO036_To verify error message is displayed when Date of first registration has not been captured required
TCFO037_To verify error message is displayed when Engine No. is not required captured
TCFO038_To verify error message is displayed when Load Vehicle without authorising the Order
TCFO039_To verify error message is displayed when user Loads a Cancelled Vehicle Order
